summary: Detective Catherine Palmer investigates a series of sexually gruesome serial murders and becomes embroiled in a world of lesbianism and bondage after she becomes obsessed with one of the victims' paramours.
cast: Ellen Barkin|Wendy Crewson|Peta Wilson|Karen Young|Julian Sands|Stephen Baldwin|Marshall Bell|Beau Starr|Bill MacDonald|Stewart Bick|Ellen-Ray Hennessy|Lara Daans|Claire Burton|Fulvio Cecere|Zerha Leverman|Melanie Nicholls-King|Susanne Sutchy|Danielle Marie Straus|Linda V. Carter|Gene Mack|Robert B. Kennedy|Lauren Piech|Kevin Rushton|Dorothy Bennie|Doug Lennox|Jacqueline McLeod|Lacey Von Erich|Jean Daigle|Michael Fletcher|Wendy Lum|Alex Ross
title: Extraña compasión
